author: ryanleeschneider
content: Which URLs are you hitting?  Sounds like we've had a huge uptick in `.../validators` and `..../validators/:id` requests since late last week and have struggled to keep instances returning those endpoints successfully w/ the increased demand.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: We plan on upgrading our BNs to latest teku sometime early this week which will hopefully help w/ the efficiency of that endpoint which in turn should make the overall service more stable.

author: arnetheduck
content: it is used for checkpoint sync primarily

author: ajsutton
content: Requesting finalized states like that tends to be slow and may time out. That latest finalized state is cheap to access but once you go before that it requires regeneration or quite a lot of disk reads with the tree format.  What's the reason for using a specific older slot number with checkpoint sync?
